name: Stradom House, Autograph Collection
description: Stradom House Autograph Collection is housed in an outstanding historical building in Krakow, situated between the Royal castle and the Jewish district. The 125 guestrooms Hotel is a perfect spot to explore the bustling city, surrounded by local attractions, and tailored made experiences. The chic destination is offering a blend of Polish modernism and original historical details. Travellers unwind themselves at Sol SPA, the contemporary Wellness center, including a state-of-the-art Fitness, exclusive wet facilities and an Indoor lap pool. Gourmet traveller's are delighted with an elegant seafood restaurant, John Dory. The guests will experience an upscale eatery, Gaia inspired by the Mediterranean countries cuisine, where the lively atmosphere sets the stage. Hedwig’s Club introduces a world-class bar and a wine cellar in a spectacular converted chapel. This is a Lifestyle venue assembled, transformed and prepared to be a one-of-a-kind experience.Marriott

name: Campanile Krakow South
description: Featuring a bar, Campanile Krakow South is located in Kraków in the Lesser Poland region, 4.7 km from Wawel Royal Castle and 5.2 km from National Museum of Krakow. With a restaurant, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, the rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV. At Campanile Krakow South every room comes with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, vegetarian and vegan options. The accommodation offers a children's playground. Speaking English and Polish, staff are ready to help around the clock at the reception. Town Hall Tower is 5.2 km from Campanile Krakow South, while Main Market Square is 5.2 km away. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 17 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Sheraton Grand Krakow
description: A 5-star experience providing guests with Krakow’s best views. Located at the foot of The Royal Wawel Castle, on the banks of the Wisla River, Sheraton Grand Krakow is steps away from Krakow Cathedral, Main Market Square and Kazimierz district, but also close to the shopping areas and Krakow's conference center. Fully renovated Lobby and Atrium will inspire you and the recently opened Anima Restaurant will deliver extraordinary Italian culinary experience. Sport fans can enjoy live transmissions in our SomePlace Else sports bar. Our famous Roof Top Terrace with amazing views is the best place to enjoy refreshing cocktails. Our 232 airy, fully renovated family guest rooms and suites connect with what you love the most: smart TV with a wide range of channels, in-room dining, High-Speed Internet, and the unique comfort of the Sheraton Signature Sleep Experience bed. Swim laps in our heated indoor pool or workout at our Sheraton Fitness. Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes pets for a fee.Marriott

name: Hotel Kossak
description: Hotel Kossak is located in the centre of Kraków in a picturesque area, near Vistula River, just 500 metres from Wawel Castle, offering rooms with free Wi-Fi and air conditioning. The hotel also has a 24-h fitness centre and a sauna. The rooms offer views of the castle and the river. All guestrooms feature a seating area, an LCD TV and a bathroom with a heated mirror. Guests can enjoy the panoramic view of Kraków from the hotel's restaurant. Hotel Kossak offers 24/7 front desk. The hotel’s staff is available for guests who wish to plan a local excursion. The Main Market Square is just a 10-minute walk away from the property.

name: Hotel Alexander I
description: Located 550 metres from Kraków’s Old Town, Hotel Alexander offers rooms in three standards: Business, Standard and Premium with classical décor and wooden furniture. The rooms provide heating and air-conditioning, work desk, free internet connection, satellite TV, a minibar, an electric kettle, as well as tea and coffe making facilities. Every bathroom has a hairdryer and shower. Children are welcome to the game room. The staff speaks Polish and English. In the Old Town’s Main Market located 500 m from Hotel Alexander there is the St Mary’s Basilica, Cloth Hall, and the Czartoryski Museum. Wawel Castle is 1.2 km away. Galeria Krakowska Shopping Centre and Kraków Główny Railway Station are both within 1 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Ferreus Modern Art Deco
description: Conveniently situated in Kraków, Hotel Ferreus Modern Art Deco provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a terrace. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as an indoor pool and a sauna. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a desk and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is equipped with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. A continental, Full English/Irish or vegetarian breakfast is available daily at the property. Speaking English, Italian and Polish, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area at the reception. Popular points of interest near Hotel Ferreus Modern Art Deco include Lost Souls Alley, St. Mary's Basilica and St. Florian's Gate. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 17 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hyatt Place Krakow
description: No description found

name: Hotel Krakus
description: Krakus Hotel is situated in Podgorze district of Krakow, near Vistula River, about 4 kilometres from the Old Town. It offers rooms with bathrooms, TVs, telephones and free Wi-Fi. During your stay you can visit the hotel restaurant, serving traditional Polish and international cuisine. The on-site bar boasts a large selection of alcohols. Krakus Hotel features also 24/7 front desk, meeting facilities and a laundry. There also is a gift shop at the hotel, which also provides a luggage storage service. Guest can also get tourist information directly at the Krakus. The Chembudowa Fair Centre and Kraków Fair are both within 1 km and can be easily reached with municipal transport.

name: Hotel Stary
description: The luxurious Hotel Stary is located in the heart of Kraków’s Old Town. It features a seasonal Sky Bar, located on a rooftop terrace and featuring a view of the Main Market and a picturesque panorama of the Old Town. Guests of the hotel have free access to the on-site spa, which includes a sauna, gym, and a steam bath. In addition, 2 swimming pools with swim jets are available. The air-conditioned rooms and suites at the Stary have bathrooms with a bathtub and shower. Plasma TVs with satellite channels are also available in every room. Some rooms have a balcony. It offers free internet, mineral water and newspapers. It is possible to enjoy a massage or a treatment in the wellness & spa centre, at a surcharge and upon prior request. In the morning guests can enjoy a traditional Polish breakfast. The Trzy Rybki restaurant serves traditional Polish dishes. In addition, the hotel also has a bar, café and a club. Hotel Stary is 1.1 km from the Wawel Castle. The old Jewish district, Kazimierz is 1 km away. Kraków Główny Train Station and Galeria Krakowska shopping centre are also 1 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Estera
description: Conveniently situated in Kraków, Hotel Estera provides air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is allergy-free and is located 1.4 km from St. Mary's Basilica. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room comes with a safety deposit box and certain rooms include city views. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Hotel Estera offers a continental or vegetarian breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Lost Souls Alley, Wawel Royal Castle and St. Florian's Gate. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 17 km from Hotel Estera, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Polonia
description: The historic Hotel Polonia is situated in the Old Town Kraków, just 650 metres from Main Market Square. City’s main railway station, Kraków, Główny, is only a 5-minute walk away. All rooms at the Polonia are classically furnished and come with traditional décor. Each has a spacious bathroom with a shower. Some offer air conditioning. Guests receive a complimentary bottle of water. A traditional breakfast buffet is served daily. The Polonia Restaurant offers Polish dishes and homemade specialities. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange trips to Wieliczka Salt Mine, as well as luggage storage. Shuttle services can be arranged. Hotel Polonia overlooks the Słowacki Theatre and the Kraków Barbican. Wawel Royal Castle is just a 20-minute walk away. Galeria Krakowska Shopping Mall is just round the corner.

name: Hotel Saski Krakow, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: With 200 years of history, our hotel is one block from Old Town’s main plaza and The Cloth Hall. Nearly all Old Town’s restaurants, museums, galleries, and shops are within a 10-minute walk, and Wawel Royal Castle is a 15-minute walk. Take a tram to the Jewish district of Kazimierz. At the end of the day, enjoy a bite and drinks at our on-site restaurant and bar.Hilton

name: Hotel Santi
description: Located in the historic house in the Old Town of Kraków, a very short walk from the Main Market Square, 4-star Hotel Santi offers classically furnished rooms with free Wi-Fi and picturesque Old Town Views. Every room in Hotel Santi features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a tea and coffee making set and a bathroom with a bath or a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms on the 1st and 2nd floor feature unique frescoes from the 18th and 19th century. The hotel offers airport transfer and ticket services. Buffet breakfast is served in the hotel restaurant and there is a bar next to the reception. It is 1 km to Kraków Główny Train Station. It takes 7 minutes to walk to Wawel Castle and 15 minutes – to Kazimierz District.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Krakow
description: Radisson Blu is a 5-star hotel, located just a 7-minute walk of Kraków’s Main Market Square and the Royal Wawel Castle. It offers spacious and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. Free access to sauna and a fitness club is provided. All non-smoking rooms at the Radisson Blu are classically furnished and bright. Each comes with tea and coffee-making facilities and a luxurious bathroom with a bathtub. Some have a seating area. A varied breakfast is served every morning at the Solfez restaurant. Guests can enjoy international and seafood dishes at the Milk&Co restaurant or a wide selection of coffee at Salt&Co bar. For guests travelling with small children the hotel offers bath toys and cosmetics, as well as bathrobes and slippers. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange concierge service. A beauty salon and massage treatments are available. Guests can rent out bicycles for free. Radisson Blu Hotel Kraków is located only 1.5 km from Kraków Główny Railway Station. City’s main attractions are located within just a few-minute walk.

name: Hotel Unicus Palace
description: Boasting a fitness centre, a restaurant as well as a bar, Hotel Unicus Palace is situated in the centre of Kraków, 1.4 km from National Museum of Krakow. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a sauna and a hammam. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, room service and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Unicus Palace rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a buffet or à la carte breakfast. Popular points of interest near Hotel Unicus Palace include Town Hall Tower, Main Market Square and Cloth Hall. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Wielopole
description: The 3-star boutique Hotel Wielopole is located 5 minutes’ walk from Kraków’s Main Market Square. Its rooms offer a fridge, tea/coffee facilities and free WiFi. In the morning a varied breakfast is served. The air-conditioned rooms at the Wielopole are spacious, classically furnished and include high-quality mattresses. Each comes with satellite TV and a work desk. All have a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. Hotel Wielopole houses a restaurant which serves Polish and international dishes for breakfast, lunch and dinner. The helpful front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange airport transfer or car rental, as well as provide tourist information and city guides. Guests of Hotel Wielopole can walk to Wawel Castle and Kazimierz Jewish District in just 10 minutes. Excellent bus and tram connections allow for easy access to all parts of the city.

name: Leonardo Boutique Hotel Krakow Old Town
description: Strategically located in the middle of the city, this 3-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Krakow. Guests can also take advantage of free wireless internet throughout their stay. There are a range of amenities available to guests of Leonardo Boutique Hotel Krakow Old Town, including 24-hour room service, meeting rooms and an express check-in and check-out feature. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can assist with booking tours and tickets. Leonardo Boutique Hotel Krakow Old Town features 100 air conditioned rooms. Rooms also include flat-screen TVs and plenty of workspace. The on-site restaurant offers European dishes in a traditional setting. A buffet breakfast is available each morning. Krakow's attractions, such as Wawel Cathedral, the Wawel Royal Castle and Main Market Square, are within easy walking distance of Leonardo Boutique Hotel Krakow Old Town. The hotel also provides parking for guests with a vehicle.Revato

name: ibis Styles Kraków Centrum
description: Center of Krakow is dream location for tourists and for business trip. ibis Styles Krakow Centrum is a friendly place, well-equipped with all comforts and close to main attractions. ibis Styles Krakow Centrum combines history with modernity. Original, sophisticated design creates a cozy, energizing atmosphere, ideal to and work. Rooms are decorated with maximum attention to detail and functionalityaccorhotels.com

name: Happy Tower
description: Happy Tower is an accommodation located in Kraków, within a 15-minute walk from the Main Market Square, Wawel Royal Castle and Kazimierz Jewish District. The modern apartments will provide you with a TV. There is a fully equipped kitchenette in some of the apartments. Private bathrooms come with a shower. You can enjoy city view from the rooms. If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out St. Mary's Basilica (850 metres). Krakow - Balice Airport is located 12 km from the property.

name: Vienna House Andel's Cracow
description: Vienna House Andel's Cracow is a contemporary 4-star hotel, located just 9 minutes’ walk from the Main Market Square in Kraków. Its designer rooms come with air conditioning and satellite TV. A varied buffet breakfast is served every morning at the Mavericks Restaurant, which serves creative, California-style dishes with Asian, Mexican and European influences. In the evening, guests can relax over a drink in the bar Smok. The spacious rooms at Vienna House Andel's Cracow come with a flat-screen TV and a laptop safe box. Some are located on the top floors and feature panoramic views of the beautiful Old Town. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange airport shuttle service and tips on what to do and see in Kraków. Guests can relax in the sauna or work out in the fitness centre. Vienna House Andel's Cracow is situated in the very heart of the city, just off the Main Railway Station and Galeria Krakowska, Kraków’s main shopping centre.

name: Hotel Pod Roza
description: The recently renovated 5-star Hotel Pod Różą is housed in a Renaissance palace in Kraków's Old Town, just off the Main Market Square. It features elegant restaurant and stylish, air-conditioned rooms. Pod Różą is the oldest hotel in Kraków and hosted many famous guests since the 17th century. The rooms at Pod Różą are traditionally decorated and come with a luxurious bathroom with heated floors and Italian fittings. All have free internet and an LCD TV with satellite channels. Wellness & Spa access is included in the room price. A continental breakfast is served every morning at the hotel restaurant, Pod Różą, which specialises in traditional Polish dishes. Hotel Pod Różą is located within a 10-minute walk of the Wawel Royal Castle. Kazimierz, the famous Jewish district, is just one kilometer away.

name: Holiday Inn Krakow City Centre
description: Central Krakow hotel in the heart of the Old Town, with free Wi-Fi and a conference centre.The Holiday Inn® Krakow City Centre hotel is a five-minute walk from the vast Main Square in the city’s historic Old Town. Local tram and bus stops are nearby, and Kraków Główny train station is within easy reach. John Paul II International Airport Kraków–Balice is a 25-minute drive.The hotel’s 12 fully equipped function spaces include a stylish conference room for up to 440 people, and a short drive takes you to the ICE Krakow Congress Centre.Krakow's 13th-century Rynek Główny square is lined with palaces and churches, including the iconic St. Mary’s Basilica. The Kazimierz Jewish Quarter, a 12-minute walk, is home to the 15th-century Old Synagogue and its Jewish culture museum. You can walk to the hilltop Wawel Royal Castle and the art museum within 15 minutes.At this hotel, you can enjoy IHG One Rewards free WI-FI throughout the building, a business centre, on-site parking for a daily fee, and a mini-gym. Rooms come with a pillow menu to help you get a good night’s sleep. Wake up to a continental buffet breakfast in The City restaurant, and dine on Polish and Mediterranean cuisine in the stylish Impresja. After a busy day, enjoy an energising mini-gym workout or relax with friends in the lively Reflections Bar and Restaurant.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: H15 Hotel Francuski
description: The elegant, 5-star H15 Hotel Francuski is located only 400 metres from the Main Market Square in Kraków. It offers stylish rooms with free internet, tea and coffee-making facilities and a minibar. All rooms at the Francuski are decorated in Art Nouveau style with period details and furniture. Each comes with satellite TV and a bathroom with a bathtub or shower, toiletries and a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served at the hotel restaurant. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange shuttle service, store guests’ valuables in the safe or assist with luggage storage. Concierge services can also be arranged for. H15 Hotel Francuski is situated 1.2 km from the Wawel Royal Castle. The city’s main railway station, Kraków Główny, is only a 5-minute walk away.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Krakow Airport
description: A convenient base for guests who want to catch a flight, or those who wish to spend some time exploring the city, the Hilton Garden Inn Krakow Airport hotel is located just opposite Krakow Airport, and offers easy access to many shops, restaurants, entertainment and attractions. Follow the ‘Royal Route’ through the historic Old Town, or admire the magnificent Romanesque, Renaissance and Gothic architecture of Wawel Castle. Catch a bus from the city center to the impressive Wieliczka Salt Mines, or escape from the hustle and bustle of the city to Lake Kryspinow: a huge lake which boasts an artificial beach, a guarded swimming area and recreation facilities. With nine flexible meeting rooms, a boardroom, the latest A/V technology and a 24-hour business center, this Krakow Airport hotel is ideal for a variety of business and social events for up to 352 people. Print documents securely from your guest room to the complimentary 24-hour business center, and enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the hotel and in every guest room. Settle into an comfortable and contemporary guest room or suite at this hotel near Krakow Airport, equipped with a work desk and ergonomic task chair, a 39-inch flat-screen TV and a plush Suite Dreams by Serta Bed. Work out in the complimentary fitness center and stock up on snacks, drinks and sundries in the Pavilion Pantry. Unwind with a glass of wine or beer before dining in the Garden Grille & Bar, which offers delicious international cuisine for breakfast, lunch and dinner.Hilton

name: Hotel Senacki
description: Overlooking the 17th century Church of St Peter and Paul, Hotel Senacki is located in Kraków’s Royal Route. It offers classic rooms with satellite TV and free internet access. The elegant rooms of the Senacki feature a traditional and functional design. All come with a minibar, radio and a telephone. They also have tea and coffee making facilities. Each bathroom has a hairdryer. Hotel Senacki is situated just 450 metres from Kraków’s Wawel Castle. Kazimierz, the old Jewish District is within 700 metres, while the Main Market Square is just 350 metres away. In the mornings, a breakfast buffet is served in the hotel’s 14th century cellars.

name: Hotel Perla
description: Hotel Perła is located in a quiet area of Cracow and offers elegant accommodation with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. The hotel offers a 24-hour front desk service. Each room at Perła features a modern bathroom, as well as a seating area. There also are desks to work at, equipped with telephones. Guests are welcome to dine in the restaurant, offering European dishes and traditional Polish cuisine. A large selection of drinks is available in the bar. Hotel Perła is located 7.8 km from the Market Square, with easy access to Balice Airport and to the Zakopane-Kraków motorway. The Shrine of Divine Mercy in Łagiewniki is 3 km away. The hotel has a direct rail connection to Energylandia. Travel time from Kraków Swoszowice station to Zator-Park Rozrywki station is 50 minutes.

name: Grand Ascot Hotel
description: Located in central Kraków, the 4-star Grand Ascot Hotel is just 600 metres from the Main Market Square and within short walking distance from multiple landmarks and other attractions of the Kraków Old Town. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant and bar. All rooms at the Grand Ascot Hotel are air-conditioned and equipped with tea/coffee making facilities, ironing facilities, a TV and a fridge. Extras include a work desk, free WiFi and a safe. There is a 24-hour front desk, as well as conference facilities at the property. A sauna and a gym are also available. The famous Kazimierz Jewish District is 2 km from Grand Ascot Hotel, while the Central Railway Station is 1.5 km away. Krakow - Balice Airport is 12 km from the property.

name: Mercure Krakow Stare Miasto
description: We are located between Krakowskie Centrum Komunikacji, Krakow Communication Center and the old town, which is only a 10-minute walk from our hotel. Our building boasts a unique facade and interiors. Stylish rooms and a modern conference center are our response to the needs of a rapidly changing Krakow. The Winestone Restaurant is a unique place where you can savor delicious meals, meet with friends or simply relax after a busy day. We are truly passionate about our guests.accorhotels.com

name: Krakow For You Main Square Apartments
description: Krakow For You Main Square Apartments are located in the heart of Kraków’s Old Town, only 50 metres from the Main Square. It offers self-catering apartments with flat-screen TV with Polish channels and free WiFi. The apartments of Krakow For You Main Square Apartments are spacious and feature a modern interior design. All have a kitchenette with an electric kettle and a refrigerator. The front desk of Krakow For You Main Square Apartments can arrange tickets and provides tour information. A shuttle service is available. There are many landmarks nearby, including the Cloth Hall and St Mary’s Basilica, both of which are within 140 metres. The Wawel Castle is within 600 metres.

name: Hotel Maltanski
description: The 3-star Hotel Maltański is located 500 metres from the Kraków’s beautiful Main Market Square. It offers elegant rooms with free internet, heated bathroom floor and tea and coffee-making facilities. A varied buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the hotel restaurant, which specialises in international dishes. All rooms at the Maltański are classically furnished and decorated with stylish features. Each comes with a minibar and cable TV. Most rooms have a patio, where guests can relax after a long day. Free bottle of mineral water and newspapers are offered. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can store guests’ valuables in the hotel safe. Dry cleaning and laundry services can be arranged. Hotel Maltański is situated only 300 metres from Wawel Royal Castle. The peaceful Planty Park is just outside the hotel.

name: Hotel Polski Pod Bialym Orlem
description: The 5-star Hotel Polski is located just opposite the St. Florian’s Gate, 4 minutes’ walk from the Main Market Square. It offers spacious rooms and luxury suites with free WiFi. All rooms at the Polski Pod Białym Orłem are elegant and decorated with warm colours. Each comes with tea and coffee making facilities, a satellite TV and a minibar. Each room is equipped with a safe, where guests can store their valuables. Hotel restaurant, Pijarska 17 offers Polish dishes. Friendly hotel staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange city tours or concierge services. Hotel Polski Pod Białym Orłem is located within just a 15-minute walk of the Wawel Royal Castle. The bus and railway stations are only 300 metres away.

name: Hotel Rubinstein
description: Hotel Rubinstein is housed in a 15th-century building, located in the heart of the Kazimierz District in Kraków, just off the Old Synagogue. Its rooms and apartments offer air conditioning. All rooms and apartments at the Hotel Rubinstein come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a minibar and a safe. Many feature impressive wooden ceilings and beams from the 17th and 18th century. A varied buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every morning. It is served at the Rubinstein Restaurant, situated on a glazed patio and specialised in international dishes. After a long day, guest can relax in the Rubinstein’s sauna. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and offers tourist information on what to see and do in Kraków. Rubinstein Hotel is located within just a 10-minute walk of the beautiful Wawel Royal Castle.

name: Hotel Ester
description: The Hotel Ester is located in the heart of Kazimierz, Kraków’s historic Jewish district, within 20 metres of the Old Synagogue. All rooms have private bathrooms and a free Wi-Fi connection. Ester’s air-conditioned rooms all feature flat-screen satellite TVs. Each has a work desk and a refrigerator. A safety deposit box and free mineral water are also provided. In the mornings a breakfast buffet is offered on-site. Later in the day, Ester’s restaurant serves traditional Polish and Jewish dishes. After a meal guests can get a massage or visit the hotel’s sauna. The hotel’s staff is available 24 hours a day. The hotel's tour desk will help guests organise trips to the many places of interest that surround Kraków, such as the Wieliczka Salt Mine. The Wawel Castle and Old Town’s Main Market are within the is 1.3 km from the hotel.

name: Grottger Luxury Boutique Hotel City
description: Located in a renovated Art Deco villa in the quiet, exclusive neighbourhood in central Kraków, 1,2 km from the Old Town and 1,5 km from the historic Main Market Square, Grottger Luxury Boutique Hotel City features a garden and terrace. Free private parking is available on site. Each room here is individually designed, with oakwood floors, a private, marble bathroom with free toiletries and a flat-screen TV in every unit. Blackout curtains and safes are available. All rooms come with tea/coffee making facilities and mineral water, as well as air conditioning. Towels are offered. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. The property also offers delivery of selected food products. Car hire is available at the property and the area is popular for cycling and hiking. Cloth Hall is 1.5 km from Grottger Luxury Boutique Hotel City, while National Museum of Krakow is 1.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is John Paul II Airport, 9 km from Hotel Grottger.

name: Aparthotel Camea
description: Aparthotel Camea is located in the centre of old Kraków, just a one-minute walk of the Main Market Square. It features air-conditioned rooms with free high-speed internet and LCD TV. All rooms at the Camea are fitted with a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms are furnished with antique furniture. Some have a balcony. Massage services are available upon request. Front desk staff can assist with sightseeing tours and bicycle/car rental services. Aparthotel Camea is located within a 2-minute walk from the Wawel Royal Castle. Kazimierz, the Jewish District is just 600 metres away. Kraków Główny Railway Station is 800 metres from the Camea.

name: Hampton by Hilton Krakow
description: Get your day off to the best start - there is a hot breakfast included when you stay. Stock up on all your favorite snacks and beverages in the convenience store, or unwind with a drink and a tasty bite at any time in the bar. Maintaining your exercise routine is easy in the contemporary fitness center. Keep in touch with the office in the free work zone, and plan a conference, training session or social event with four flexible meeting spaces and state-of-the-art A/V equipment. Our friendly, professional staff will be on hand to make sure that your meeting or celebration is seamless and hassle-free. All of the comfortable and stylish guest rooms at the Hampton by Hilton Krakow hotel boast modern decor and are equipped with free WiFi, a 32-inch LCD TV, a work desk, coffee/tea making facilities, a radio alarm clock, and an iron and ironing board. The spacious bathroom has a walk-in shower, and the comfy bed has a premium mattress and ample soft pillows, ensuring a restful night’s sleep. Larger corner rooms and accessible guest rooms are also available for your comfort and convenience. Friendly service, clean rooms, comfortable surroundings, every time. If you’re not satisfied, we don’t expect you to pay. That’s our commitment and your guarantee. That’s 100% Hampton by Hilton™.Hilton

name: Q Hotel Kraków
description: Q Hotel Kraków is located in Kraków and offers free WiFi access. Each room here will provide you with air conditioning. There is also an electric kettle. Private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer. Extras include a desk and bed linen. At Q Hotel Kraków you will find a 24-hour front desk and a restaurant. Other facilities offered at the property include luggage storage. The hotel is 2.8 km from Wisla Krakow Stadium, 3.1 km from Military Hospital with Policlinic and 3.2 km from John Paul II Hospital - Krakow. Krakow - Balice Airport is 7 km away.

name: Plaza Boutique Hotel
description: 2.1 km from Schindler Factory Museum, Plaza Boutique Hotel is situated in Kraków and has a bar and free WiFi. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. It is located 2.1 km from Galeria Kazimierz and 2.7 km from Wawel Royal Castle. All rooms at the hotel come with a seating area. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower, free toiletries and a hair dryer. Guest rooms at Plaza Boutique Hotel feature air conditioning and a desk. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. St. Mary's Basilica is 3.2 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 23 km from Plaza Boutique Hotel.

name: Booking Hotel Crown Piast & Spa
description: The 5-star Crown Piast Hotel & Park is located within a 10-minute drive of Kraków’s city centre and is surrounded by a large, green garden. It offers classically decorated rooms, as well as tennis courts and monitored parking. All rooms at the Crown Piast are spacious, air-conditioned and decorated with classic furniture. Each comes with free Wi-Fi, tea and coffee making facilities and a LED TV with satellite channels. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can assist with bicycle rental or provide tourist information. A breakfast is served every morning at the hotel restaurant, Anturium. Guests can also try a selection of lunches and desserts at the Coffee Bar, on a terrace or in the Karczma Regionalna located deep in the garden. Crown Piast Hotel & Park is located within a 15-minute drive of the Kraków Balice Airport. Airport shuttle is available at a surcharge.

name: Spatz Aparthotel
description: The elegant Spatz Aparthotel is situated in Kraków’s Kazimierz district, just 100 metres from the Tempel Synagogue. It offers comfortable rooms with a tea and coffee-making facilities and free internet. All luxurious rooms at the Spatz are elegantly furnished and have laminated floors. Each comes with an LCD TV with cable channels. All have a work desk, mini bar, safe and a modern bathroom with a hairdryer. Iron and iron board is available upon request. The helpful front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can provide tourist information and assist with luggage storage. Bicycle rental and tour booking is available. Buffet breakfasts with hot meals are available. Spatz Aparthotel is located within a 16-minute walk from the beautiful Main Market Square. It is surrounded by atmospheric cafés and pubs of Kazimierz.

name: Hotel Wawel Queen
description: Attractively located in Kraków, Hotel Wawel Queen features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, private parking and room service. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. Guests can make use of a bar. At the hotel, rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Guests at Hotel Wawel Queen can enjoy a continental breakfast. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving international cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and gluten-free options can also be requested. Hotel Wawel Queen offers a terrace. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Town Hall Tower, Main Market Square and Cloth Hall. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 15 km from Hotel Wawel Queen, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Secesja
description: Located just 5 minutes’ walk from the Wawel Castle, the 3-star Hotel Secesja offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. A large and varied buffet breakfast is served daily. All rooms at the Secesja are comfortably furnished and decorated with stylish details. Each comes with satellite TV and a modern bathroom with either a bath or a shower and a hairdryer. Secesja’s elegant bar and restaurant specialises in traditional Polish as well as international dishes. Front desk staff is available 24/7, ready to provide tourist information and sightseeing directions. Hotel Secesja is situated in a quiet area of the Kazimierz Jewish District. Karków's beautiful Main Market Square is only 1.3 km away. It is also close to major shopping centres such as Krakowska, Bonarka and Kazimierz. ICE Kraków Congress Centre is 900 metres away.

name: Hotel Galicya
description: The 3-star Hotel Galicya is located within a 10-minute tram ride of Kraków’s beautiful Main Market Square. It offers spacious rooms with Wi-Fi and satellite TV. All rooms at the Galicya come with a working space. Each has a modern bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. Some rooms have tea and coffee-making facilities. A varied buffet breakfast is served every morning at the hotel restaurant, which specialises in Polish and international dishes. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can provide tourist information or arrange bicycle rental. Luggage storage and shuttle service are available. Hotel Galicya is located within just a 10-minute drive of the Wawel Royal Castle. Private parking is available at a surcharge.

name: Leonardo Boutique Hotel Krakow City Center
description: Leonardo Boutique Hotel Krakow City Center is located in central Kraków, only 950 m from Wawel Castle, 750 metres from the Old Town and 350 metres from the Vistula Boulevards. The property features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi access. Modern, design rooms here feature six changing light colours and will provide you with a large, flat-screen TV with cable channels and bathroom has heated floors, a lit rainshower, towels and free toiletries. At the property you will find a 24-hour front desk, a garden with a terrace. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge and a games room. Shuttle services, parties and trips can be arranged at extra charge. Virtual concierge and a business centre are available. It is 600 metres from National Museum of Krakow. Krakow - Balice Airport is 11,5 km away.

name: Ibis Styles Krakow East
description: The hotel is located in the greenest district of Krakow, Nowa Huta, which ranked 1st in the TOP 10 best areas to live in Europe in the British newspaper The Guardian. The hotel has 63 air-con rooms, decorated in a modern style and a conference room. Beds are extremely comfortable thanks to the special Sweet Bed mattresses. We meet the requirements of all market segments of both business and tourism.accorhotels.com

name: Niebieski Art Hotel & Spa
description: The 5-star Niebieski Art Hotel & Spa is located at the Kraków’s Vistula riverbank, just 1.5 km from the Wawel Royal Castle. It features modern spa facilities, spacious rooms and free WiFi, All air-conditioned rooms at the Niebieski are bright and decorated with warm colours. Each has a large LCD TV with satellite channels. Guests can benefit from a minibar and a safe. Free water, tea and coffee are provided. The on-site Vanilla Spa offers a wide selection of spa treatments. Guests can relax in a sauna or work out in the fitness room. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can assist with ticket service to main city’s attractions. A varied buffet breakfast is served at the Vanilla Sky Restaurant, which specialises in Mediterranean and Polish fusion cuisine. Guests can enjoy a drink at the terrace with a river view. The hotel's pizzeria, Fresco, serves Italian dishes. Niebieski Art Hotel & Spa is situated within a 20-minute walk from the Old Town Kraków. It offers excellent tram and bus connections with all parts of the city.

name: Golden Tulip Krakow Kazimierz
description: Featuring free WiFi and a children's playground, 4-star hotel Golden Tulip Krakow Kazimierz offers accommodation in the historic Kazimierz district of Kraków, a few steps away from the lively Wolnica Square. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Private parking is available on site. Each modern, air-conditioned room here comes with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. A flat-screen TV is featured, as is a minibar and tea and coffee making set. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. There is a restaurant and a bar for guests to enjoy. Shuttle service is available at a surcharge. Kazimierz Jewish District is 200 metres from Golden Tulip Krakow Kazimierz, while Wawel Royal Castle is 800 metres from the property. Krakow - Balice Airport is 11 km away.

name: Bonerowski Palace
address: Rynek Glowny 42/ul. Swietego Jana 1, 31-013 Krakow, Malopolskie
description: Located on Kraków’s Main Market Square in a historic tenement, The Bonerowski Palace offers rooms and luxury apartments. It is located just steps from all the attractions of Kraków’s Main Market Square and 900 metres from Kraków Główny Railway Station. Parking is 500 metres from the property. The spacious rooms and apartments feature a seating area with a work desk. Each comes fitted with a flat-screen TV offering satellite channels. Free mineral water is offered, as is access to wet and dry sauna. In the morning, Bonerowski’s guests can enjoy a hot and cold breakfast buffet. The Amalia Brasserie, set on the ground floor, is known for both modern Polish dishes and French cuisine. There is a summer/winter outdoor garden from which guests can admire the Market Square. In Royal and Ducal Hall there are meeting facilities suitable for wedding receptions, banquets and business meetings. Piano concerts take place in The Bonerowski Palace's historic Royal Hall.

name: Hotel Indigo Krakow - Old Town
description: In the heart of the city and next to Florian Gate, the largest gate into the historical city, sits the Hotel Indigo® Krakow – Old Town. Housed in a stunning 19th century building. The hotel design has been inspired by three Polish painters from different centuries and that heritage has been subtly brought into our rooms and our public areas. Old Kleparz market is opposite our hotel and we are walking distance to Krakow’s Main Square, St. Mary’s Basilica, the Clothes Hall, the main shopping street (Florianska), Wawel Castle and the Jewish district.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hilton Garden Inn Krakow
description: Located in the centre of Krakow with spectacular views of Wawel Castle over the Vistula River, the Hilton Garden Inn Kraków is the first Hilton Garden Inn in Poland. Only 7.5 miles from Balice airport, this Kraków hotel is only a few minutes walk from famous historical attractions and the Jewish quarter of Kazimierz All of the beautifully decorated, air-conditioned Guest Rooms at the Hilton Garden Inn Kraków hotel feature a generous working area, complimentary internet access, and ergonomic Mirra® chairs. Business guests will appreciate the complimentary 24-hour business center and the conference center, with 400 sqm of naturally lit meeting space and a large foyer with castle views. Keep fit in the complimentary Fitness Center or shop in Bonarka City Centre mall, visit the nearby Wieliczka Salt Mine or the Holocaust Museum in Auschwitz, or attend one of almost 3000 concerts and attractions held in the Philharmonic Hall, Slowacki Theatre and more unusual places, such as factories and open air parks. ***** Everything. Right where you need it. ®*****Hilton

name: Matejko Hotel
description: Hotel Matejko is located in the Old Town centre of Kraków, just 650 metres from the Main Market Square. It features comfortable rooms with satellite TV and free WiFi. All rooms at the Matejko are fitted with a modern bathroom with a shower. Each has a working space with a telephone and a desk, as well as a complimentary bottle of mineral water. Some have air-conditioning and a seating area. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in an air-conditioned restaurant specialising in European cuisine. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can provide tourist information or arrange shuttle services. Hotel Matejko is situated 500 metres from the Kraków Główny Railway Station. Galeria Krakowska Shopping Centre is only a 2-minute walk away.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Krakow Hotel & Convention Center
description: DoubleTree by Hilton Krakow, built in 2015, is within walking distance from TAURON Arena Krakow, a multi-purpose hall that hosts concerts, shows and sports competitions. The hotel is located in a green and quiet area of the city with a large 43-hectare park in the immediate vicinity. We are situated near the EXPO Krakow Fair Trade Center and many office parks. The nearest shopping center is 2 km /1.5 mi/ away. The hotel is only a 30-minute drive from Krakow Airport. Enjoy a free Spa experience in our Wellness Zone designed to revitalize and pamper you. Our hotel offers a spacious swimming pool, relaxing whirlpool bath, steam room, herbal sauna and a relaxation area. Our 150 square meter fitness center is fully equipped with a wide range of cardiovascular and strength stations. The fitness center is open 24 hours a day. Each guest room features a flat screen 40-inch TV, complimentary WiFi, spacious work desk, air conditioning, safe and refreshment center. Our hotel has a dedicated Executive Lounge, 24-hour business center and parking for 100 cars. Dine in our 5th Avenue Restaurant where we serve seasonal food that is simple, light and delicious. Unwind each evening in the contemporary Lounge Bar offering a selection of beers, spirits and cocktails.Hilton

name: Aparthotel Oberza
description: Located 40 metres from the Tempel Synagogue in Kraków’s Kazimierz district, Aparthotel Oberża offers design rooms and apartments. Each has a seating area, a satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. Aparthotel Oberża is located in a renovated residence from the 19th century. Its rooms all feature characteristic and individual designs, heating and private bathrooms. The surrounding area features various shops, bars and restaurants. Plac Nowy is 100 metres away, and the Wawel Castle is within a 10-minute walk. Wolnica Square is within 500 metres. The front desk staff is available 9:00-18:00 and provides a car rental service. It also organises tickets. An airport shuttle service is available. The property features an à la carte restaurant that serves traditional Polish dishes. Breakfast is available in the mornings.

name: Hotel Regent
description: The 3-star Hotel RT Regent is located in Kazimierz, just a 10-minute walk of the Kraków’s beautiful Wawel Royal Castle. It offers spacious and bright rooms with Wi-Fi and satellite TV. All rooms at the Regent come with a bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. Each room has a work desk, while some rooms have tea and coffee-making facilities. A varied buffet breakfast is served every morning at the hotel dining room. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can provide tourist information or arrange bicycle rental. A safety deposit box, luggage storage and shuttle service are available. Hotel RT Regent is located within just a 18-minute walk of the Main Market Square.

name: Metropolo By Golden Tulip
description: Situated in Kraków, 5.9 km from Wawel Royal Castle, Metropolo by Golden Tulip Krakow features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At Metropolo by Golden Tulip Krakow the rooms include bed linen and towels. A buffet, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Schindler Factory Museum is 6.2 km from the accommodation, while National Museum of Krakow is 6.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 18 km from Metropolo by Golden Tulip Krakow, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Kolory Guest House
description: Located in the heart of Kraków’s Kazimierz district, Kolory Guest House offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. They all feature private bathrooms with a hairdryer and towels The rooms at the Kolory are bright and are decorated with Polish folk art. For guests’ convenience, a fan has been included in each. Some have a balcony. Kolory Guest House is located just next to New Square (Plac Nowy), in an area featuring many restaurants, cafés and pubs. The Tempel Synagogue is 100 metres away, and the Wawel Castle is within 1 km away. The Kolory’s staff is available from 9 a.m. until 2 p.m; and offers a tour desk and ticket service. In addition, there is a shop with works of folk art at the property.

name: Vienna House Easy Cracow
description: Vienna House Easy by Wyndham Cracow is located in a walking distance from the center of Kraków, 900 metres away from the Kraków Główny Railway Station. It offers air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free, reliable and fast WiFi. Paid private parking is available too. The hotel's cosy yet modern and functional rooms have a private bathroom and a work desk. A varied and tasty breakfast with both hot and cold products is available in the morning. In the evenings guests may visit the hotel bar. Front desk staff at the Vienna House Easy by Wyndham Cracow are available 24 hours a day. Guests can use the hotel fitness centre for free, while sauna access is extra charged. The hotel also provides guests with a private taxi service. Vienna House Easy by Wyndham Cracow is situated about 1,5 km from the Main Market Square. The Wawel Castle is 2 km away. It`s located very close to the business districts, Tauron Arena, Opera Krakowska and Regional Courts.

name: Hotel Zakliki
description: Featuring air conditioning, Zakliki Aparthotel is situated in Kraków, 250 metres from Kraków Zakliki train stop offering connections to Kraków Balice Airport. Wisla Krakow Stadium is within 5 km while Cracovia Stadium is 6 km away. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. All units feature a satellite flat-screen TV. There is a seating and/or dining area in some units. In some rooms a microwave and kettle are also available. Some units also have a kitchenette, fitted with a fridge and stovetop. Each unit comes with a private bathroom with shower. The hotel offers free private parking on-site National Museum of Krakow is 6 km from Zakliki Aparthotel. The nearest airport is Krakow - Balice Airport, 4 km from the property.

name: ibis Krakow Stare Miasto
description: The hotel is located in the center of Krakow, a 15-minute walk from the old town and near to the train station and the bus station, which is only a 30-minute ride from Krakow-Balice Airport. Our comfortable rooms are what ibis is all about. Together with our spacious ibis Kitchen restaurant and modern conference space, they guarantee an enjoyable stay in Krakow.accorhotels.com

name: Golden Tulip Krakow City Center
description: Golden Tulip Krakow City Center offers an excellent location in the city centre, only 500 metres from the Kraków Main Square and within a walking distance from the Old Town tourist attractions. There is free Wi-Fi available. Air-conditioned and decorated with earth tones, all rooms at the Golden Tulip feature classic design. Each comes with a flat-screen TV, a seating area and a wardrobe. The bathroom is equipped with a shower. The hotel provides a lift and a conference room. All areas at Golden Tulip Krakow City Center feature air conditioning. The internet point is also available. Guests can order a meal at the à-la-carte restaurant on site or enjoy a drink at the hotel bar. The Golden Tulip is situated only 150 metres from the Planty Park and 2 km from the Wawel Castle. The nearest tram stop is just 100 metres away. Kraków Main Railway Station and Bus Station are both within 1.5 km from the hotel.

name: ibis Krakow Centrum
description: We are right next to the Poland boulevards with convenient access to Wawel Castle, Old Town and Kazimierz. Our location offers easy access to the airport and other important places in Krakow. Comfortable rooms, a spacious Ibis Kitchen restaurant, underground parking and the neighborhood of our fraternal hotel Novotel Krakow Centrum guarantees a pleasant stay in the royal city.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Gródek
description: Hotel Gródek is a 5-star boutique hotel, located in a quiet area of the Old Town of Kraków. Its individually designed rooms offer an LCD TV and free internet access. All air-conditioned rooms and apartments at the Gródek are fitted with satellite TV and a minibar. Each comes with an electric kettle and a refrigerator. Bathrooms offer floor heating and a hairdryer. Free bottle of mineral water and newspapers are offered. Every morning a buffet breakfast is served at the Gródek Restaurant, which specialises in quality Polish cuisine. Guests can relax in a beautifully appointed bar with a library and a fireplace. Front desk staff can assist guests 24 hours a day and can help with car rental or tickets booking. For more relaxation, guests can head to the sauna and massage parlour. At the Hotel Gródek, guests will be right in the very heart of Kraków, within a 3-minute walk of St. Mary’s Basilica and many cafés and restaurants around the Main Market Square. Kazimierz Jewish District is just one kilometre away.

name: Browar Lubicz Residence
description: Located 500 metres from St. Florian's Gate and less than 1 km from Lost Souls Alley in the centre of Kraków, Browar Lubicz Residence provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchenette with a dishwasher, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The aparthotel offers a children's playground. If you would like to discover the area, cycling is possible in the surroundings and Browar Lubicz Residence can arrange a bicycle rental service. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include St. Mary's Basilica, Krakow Central Railway Station and Galeria Krakowska. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 18 km from Browar Lubicz Residence.

name: Hotel Floryan Old Town
description: The Hotel Floryan is located in a 16th century building located in a pedestrian zone in Kraków’s Old Town. It offers air-conditioned rooms with private bathrooms in the city’s centre. The Hotel Floryan Old Town’s rooms have wooden floors. All come equipped with a satellite TV and a minibar. Free Wi-Fi is available in all rooms. Later in the day the restaurant serves lunch and dinner, mostly focusing on Italian and Polish dishes. Kraków’s Main Market, which has such landmarks as St. Mary’s Basilica and Drapers Hall, is 280 metres away. The Kraków Główny Train Station and Galeria Krakowska Shopping Centre are within 550 metres. The Floryan's staff is available 24 hours a day. They can help guests organise a trip or provide an airport shuttle. The property also has a limited number of free parking spaces located 500 metres from the hotel.

name: Novotel Krakow Centrum
description: A place of many possibilities just a few steps from the attractions of Krakow. It offers 198 spacious rooms, most with a view of the Vistula Bend. The offer includes conference rooms, a restaurant, a bar, a children's corner and a recreation centre with swimming pool - all this makes it ideal for a family, business and tourist stay. It is distinguished by an apartment with a terrace where you can admire the panorama of the city with a coffee, or organize an unforgettable celebration in the open air.accorhotels.com

name: Qubus Hotel Krakow
description: Qubus Kraków Hotel is located in a quiet, yet central area of Kraków, next to the Vistula River. It features a swimming pool and a hot tub located on the top floor with impressive views of the city. All air-conditioned rooms at the Qubus are fitted with free WiFi and satellite TV. Each comes with a fridge and a safety deposit box. Most bathrooms have a bathtub. In the morning guests can enjoy an award-winning breakfast buffet. The Qubus Kraków Hotel’s restaurant, specialises in Polish and European cuisine. The hotel breakfast consists of over 100 fresh products, including regional smoked sausages, cheese, salads and hot dishes. Front desk staff speaks excellent English and is available 24 hours a day. Guests can benefit from a fitness centre with a gym, a sauna and a steam bath. Qubus Kraków Hotel is situated in a beautiful area of Podgórze District, within a 5-minute walk from Kazimierz Jewish District. The Main Market Square is just 2 kilometres away.

name: Puro Krakow Stare Miasto
description: The modern and stylish PURO Kraków Stare Miasto is located just 1 km away from the beautiful Main Market Square. It offers accommodation with air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. Rooms at Puro are decorated in light colours and feature large windows. Each comes with modern equipment including a tablet, a 49-inch flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Floors are heated and the bathroom is fitted with a shower and free toiletries. There is a lounge at the hotel where guests can relax. The HINT Kraków is a gastropub where guests can enjoy variety of classic dishes in new versions and a cuisine based on comfort food. Kraków Główny Train Station is just about 200 metres and so is the popular shopping mall Galeria Krakowska.

name: Lwowska 1
description: Situated in Kraków, Lwowska 1 offers a spa centre and sauna. Schindler Factory Museum is 400 metres from the property. Private parking is available on site. The pet-friendly accommodation is air conditioned and is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some units feature a dining area and/or balcony. A fridge and kettle are also featured. Some units also have a kitchenette, equipped with a stovetop. There is a private bathroom with free toiletries in each unit. The aparthotel features free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. The property also offers mini-market. There is a 24-hour front desk at Lwowska 1. Galeria Kazimierz is 800 metres from Lwowska 1, while Kazimierz Jewish District is 900 metres away. The nearest airport is Krakow - Balice Airport, 11 km from the property.

name: Liv'Inn Aparthotel
description: Liv'Inn Aparthotel offers modern rooms and apartments located in the centre of Kraków, within walking distance of the Old Town and Kraków Główny Train Station. All units come with free unlimited Wi-Fi access and a 40" TV with satellite channels. The rooms and apartments at Liv'Inn Aparthotel come with a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. They are also equipped with a refrigerator or a minibar and a safe. The apartments come with a fully equipped kitchen, as well as seating and dining areas. Some feature a balcony. Liv'Inn Aparthotel offers will be happy to arrange an airport shuttle or help with organising sightseeing tours. From Liv'Inn Aparthotel guests can quickly get to Kraków’s Main Railway Station, which is a 9-minute drive away. The Main Market Square is a 15-minute walk from the aparthotel and there are convenient public transport services nearby.

name: Domus Mater Hotel
description: Domus Mater is located in the Kraków’s Podgórze district. It offers tastefully designed rooms and free Wi-Fi. There also is a green garden with a terrace, as well as monitored parking. Kraków Arena and the EXPO Kraków Exhibition and Convention Centre are both less than 4 km away. Every room is modernly furnished in hotel standard. It features a bathroom that has a shower and a hairdryer. Domus Mater features an elevator and a library.There is a 24-hour chapel and a gift shop offering books, as well as two conference rooms. Every morning in the dining room a breakfast buffet is served. Cold and hot beverages are served 24 hours a day. Meals can be ordered during daytime. The reception staff is at your service round-the-clock. Kraków’s Old Town is located 4,5 km away from Domus Mater. It is 5,2 km from Kraków Główny Train Station. Vistula River is 1 km away. Wawel Castle is 4,6 km from Domus Mater.

name: Hotel Nowa Panorama
description: Hotel Nowa Panorama is located in the city centre, in Kraków’s Łagiewniki district. The hotel offers rooms with free WiFi and free on-site parking in a quiet part of the city. Panorama’s rooms feature wooden furniture and private bathrooms with showers. Each room has a work desk, as well as a TV set. The hotel is located 3,5 km from Old Town. The Sanctuary of God's Mercy in Łagiewniki is only 1,5 km away. Conference Centre ICE Kraków International Conferences & Entertainment is 2.5 km away while Jagiellonian University Campus is 1.6 km away. Twardowski Rocks Park and Zakórzwek Lake are 1.5 km from the property. A bus stop is 50 metres away from the hotel and there is a 24h supermarket nearby.

name: Puro Kraków Kazimierz
description: PURO Kraków Kazimierz is set in vibrant district of Kraków and provides a fitness centre and a terrace. You can rent a bike free of charge (when weather conditions are good). Among the various facilities of this property are a shared lounge, a bar and on-site dining. Galeria Kazimierz is 300 metres away. At PURO Kraków Kazimierz, each room includes a desk. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with free toiletries, all guest rooms at PURO Kraków Kazimierz have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms also offer a seating area. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Guests at PURO Kraków Kazimierz can enjoy a breakfast, MAK bread & coffee place, Halicka restaurant and Prisma SPA. PURO Kraków Kazimierz offers a sauna*, 2 external terraces and garden. Staff at the 24-hour front desk speak English and Polish. Schindler Factory Museum is 900 metres from PURO Kraków Kazimierz, while Wawel Royal Castle is 1.1 km from the property. Krakow - Balice Airport is 11 km away. * Sauna is open for guests from Monday till Thursday between hours 4pm-10pm (from 7 am at the request of the guest, from Friday till Sunday sauna is open between 7am-10pm).

name: Nobilton Hotel
description: Offering free internet access and comfortable accommodation, this cosy hotel is situated just 10 minutes walk from the lively Jewish Quarter of Krakow and 5 minutes from the Wawel Castle. Nobilton Hotel is also conveniently located opposite the National Museum of Krakow and within walking distance of the picturesque Old Town, Market Square. The railway station can be reached in a 15 minute drive, and the airport in 20 minutes. Breakfast buffet is served in a traditional restaurant and is a great start to your day. The restaurant also offers traditional Polish cuisine, to make your stay at our hotel becomes even more special. After a busy day of sightseeing or business meetings, guests can relax in the privacy of their rooms, watch satellite TV and check mails. The hotel is fully accessible for wheelchairs.

name: Premier Krakow Hotel
description: The elegant 4-star Premier Kraków Hotel features a swimming pool and a sauna that guests have free access to. It is located within a 10-minute drive of the Kraków Old Town, which is also accessible directly via public transport. Situated in the northern part of the city, it also 10 km from Kraków Balice Airport. All rooms at the Premier Kraków are soundproofed, air-conditioned and have an LCD TV with satellite channels. Each comes with a tea and coffee-making facilities and a safe. The spacious rooms come with free WiFi. Ironing facilities are available on request. A varied buffet breakfast is served every morning at the hotel restaurant, Impresja, which specialises in international dishes. At the Act Café Bar guests can enjoy coffee or a drink. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange transfer to the city centre. Luggage storage and room service are available. Private parking is available on site.

name: Jordan Guest Rooms
description: Centrally located, Jordan Guest Rooms offers easy access to Krakow's popular shopping and sightseeing areas. The front desk is open 24 hours, and a buffet breakfast is available every morning. This 3-star guest house offers an express check-in and check-out feature, 24-hour room service and free Wi-Fi. Airport transfers and a wake-up service are available upon enquiry. Jordan Guest Rooms provides 25 rooms, each with an in-room safe, a flat-screen TV and a desk. Honeymoon suites are also available. Jordan Guest Rooms houses both a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to unwind of an evening. For those preferring to dine out, the local neighbourhood features several bars and restaurants with a choice of varied cuisines. Krakow's attractions, such as the Historical Museum of Krakow, Cloth Hall and Main Market Square, are within easy walking distance of Jordan Guest Rooms. The guest house is also located near the area's popular clubs and pubs, plus Jagiellonian University and the Academy of Music in Krakow are a 20-minute stroll away.Revato

name: Hotel Logos
description: The 3-star Hotel Logos Kraków is located in the centre of Kraków, just a 9-minute walk from the Main Market Square. It offers classically furnished rooms with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi, as well as welcome tea and coffee. All rooms at the Logos are decorated with pastel colours and come with a minibar and satellite TV. Each has a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. Mineral water and free toiletries are provided. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange shuttle service and assist with luggage storage. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the hotel restaurant, which offers a variety of dishes. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Hotel Logos Kraków is situated within a 16-minute walk from the Wawel Royal Castle. The city’s main railway station, the Kraków Główny, is 1.5 km away.

name: Park Inn by Radisson Krakow
description: Park Inn by Radisson Krakow is a modern 4-star hotel is located in the centre of Kraków, within a 15-minute walk of the Wawel Royal Castle and 100 metres from the ICE Conference Centre, as well as from 300 metres from the Vistula River Boulevards. It features spacious and colourful air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi, free tea and coffee and a minibar, as well as an LCD TV. Apart from that, the rooms have a seating area. Guests have free access to the fitness centre and a sauna. There is a large foyer, a well equipped conference centre, as well as an underground parking. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange for concierge services. A varied breakfast buffet is served every morning at the hotel restaurant, the RBG Bar & Grill, which specialises in burger and salad dishes. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel bar. 3-course meals are available. Park Inn by Radisson Krakow is situated within a 10-minute walk of the beautiful Kazimierz Jewish District. The Main Market Square is only a 15-minute walk away.

name: Aparthotel Miodosytnia
description: Located in the heart Kazimierz, Kraków's historical Jewish district, Miodosytnia is a private elegant aparthotel close to a number of sights and trendy cafes. It offers spacious accommodation with flat-screen cable TV and free Wi-Fi. The Wawel Castle on the Old Town is only 950 metres away from the hotel. Tea making facilities and towels are provided in each of our rooms. A work desk is available in some of our rooms. Each bathroom has a shower and a hairdryer. Guests can enjoy their meals and drinks in Miodosytnia’s quiet garden, open all day in the high season. The 24/7 front desk offers luggage storage, as well as travel tips and concierge services. There is also an iron available upon request, and maps of Kraków.

name: Hotel Unicus Krakow Old Town
description: Hotel Unicus Krakow Old Town is a modern boutique property located in Kraków’s Old Town, just 210 metres from the Main Market Square. All air-conditioned rooms are beautifully designed and strictly non-smoking. Free WiFi is available. The rooms at the Unicus feature docking stations for iPod and iPhone and an LCD TV with satellite channels. Guests can benefit from tea and coffee making facilities and a minibar. Guests can visit the Unicus’s top-class restaurant, offering delicious dishes by an award-winning chef. In the morning a varied buffet breakfast is served. The helpful reception staff is at guests’ disposal 24 hours a day and speaks excellent English. Car rental service and ticket service are available. Unicus Hotel also offers a sauna where guests can relax after a long day and a small gym. The Wawel Royal Castle is situated within a 20-minute walk from the hotel. Famous Kazimierz Jewish District with many cafés and restaurants is just 1.5 km away.

name: Express Kraków Hotel
description: Featuring free Wi-Fi, Premier Krakow Hotel 2 is situated in Krakow and provides modern accommodation. It offers 4-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. The hotel has 179 rooms and has been recently refurbished. In fine weather, an outdoor terrace offers an ideal spot to relax. The modern rooms at Premier Krakow Hotel 2 have tea and coffee making facilities, a private bathroom and wireless internet access. They are also fitted with a hair dryer, a telephone and a shower. Those staying at Premier Krakow Hotel 2 can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, ideally located for those who want to stay close by when looking for a bite to eat. Each evening, guests can relax in the cozy lounge bar. A buffet breakfast is served daily. The hotel is within walking distance of Krakow Lobzow Station, connecting guests with the surrounding area. Nowa Huta, Wawel Royal Castle and Main Market Square are within driving distance.HotelsCombined

name: Campanile Krakow Old Town
description: The Campanile Cracovie offers accommodation in the heart of Kraków’s Old Town, by the Planty Park. Thanks to its convenient location, guests have direct access to many shops, bars, pubs and restaurants. The Campanile’s spacious and air-conditioned rooms all feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels and bathrooms with a bath and a shower. Guests have access to free Wi-Fi in public areas. A breakfast buffet is available in the mornings. The hotel's restaurant serves French and international dishes. Guests staying at the Campanile Cracovie will have Kraków’s most popular landmarks within walking distance. This includes St Mary’s Basilica, Cloths Hall (Sukiennice) and the Jagiellonian University. The Wawel Castle is a 14 minute walk from the hotel. Kazimierz, the old Jewish Quarter, is 1.2 km away. Kraków's main railway and shuttle bus station are within 700 metres.

name: Hotel Apis
description: Hotel Apis is located in Kraków, 2 km from the city centre and just by E7 exit to Warsaw. There is free Wi-Fi in all areas. The Apis's spacious and air-conditioned rooms feature a classic design, an LCD TV, carpeted floors and wooden furniture. All include a work desk and a renovated private bathroom with a shower. Free bottled water is provided. The hotel’s staff is available 24-hours a day. Guests can visit the recreational centre, relax in the sauna or enjoy a steam bath at a surcharge. The Apis’s restaurant, Mozaika Resto Bar, serves Polish and international dishes, based on natural ingredients provided by local producers. Vegetarian and gluten-free diet options are available. There is also a cafe on site. A bus stop is close to the Apis and offers transportation to Kraków’s Old Town, which is 3.6 km away. The E77 expressway is just by the hotel and national road 79 is within 650 metres. Kraków Główny Railway Station and Galeria Krakowska Shopping Centre are both within 3 km of the Apis. There is an aqua park 2 km from the hotel and Business Quattro Park can be found within 500 metres. The distance to Kazimierz is 5 km.

name: Hotel H15 Luxury Palace
description: Set in Kraków and with St. Florian's Gate reachable within 100 metres, Hotel H15 Luxury Palace offers concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a garden, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a fitness centre, as well as an indoor pool and a sauna. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and organising tours for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel H15 Luxury Palace all rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or continental options. The accommodation offers 5-star accommodation with a hot tub. Popular points of interest near Hotel H15 Luxury Palace include Krakow Central Railway Station, Lost Souls Alley and St. Mary's Basilica. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 17 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Aparthotel Mikolaj
description: Hotel Mikołaj is ideally located just 250 meters away from the Main Market Square and other extensive cultural tourist attractions of Krakow. The hotel is a townhouse that has a warm home-away-from-home environment created by the combination of the friendly and attentive staff and its rustic interiors. All rooms have a private bathroom with a bath or a shower and each is equipped with a telephone, a radio and a TV with satellite channels. Suites consist of a cosy bedroom and a seating area and a small kitchenette. Guests enjoy easy access to many theatres, monuments, museums, and art galleries in the area. Bargain for treasures in the Main Market area, or enjoy cups of coffee in the various cafés while shopping.

name: Hotel Polonez
description: Hotel Polonez is located in central Kraków, 1,7 km from the Main Market Square. It offers classically furnished rooms with air conditioning, free WiFi and cable TV. There is also free on-site parking. All rooms at the Polonez are decorated with warm, bright tones. Each comes with a private bathroom with a shower. A hairdryer is provided. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the hotel restaurant, which offers Polish and European dishes. Barbecue facilities are also available. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can assist with luggage storage, store guests’ valuables in the hotel safe or arrange laundry services. Hotel Polonez is situated 500 metres from the AGH University of Science and Technology. The city’s main railway station, Kraków Główny, is 2,7 km away.

name: Ascot Premium Hotel
description: This 4-star hotel is located just 9 minutes' walk from the Kraków Main Market Square. It offers an excellent buffet breakfast and modern rooms with air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. The air-conditioned rooms at the Ascot Premium Hotel feature satellite TV and a safety deposit box. All have a bathroom with a shower cabin and a hairdryer. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can provide guests with tourist information and city guides. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar serving a wide range of drinks. Ascot Premium Hotel is situated just 700 metres from the Galeria Krakowska Shopping Centre. Guests can walk to the Wawel Royal Castle in just 18 minutes. Kraków Główny Railway Station is just 8 minutes' walk away. The hotel's central location enables convenient access to Arena Kraków and ICE Conference Centre, both by car and by public transport.

name: Xerion Hotel
description: Set 1.1 km from Schindler Factory Museum, Xerion Hotel offers 4-star accommodation in Kraków and has a garden, a restaurant and a bar. The property is around 2.6 km from Wawel Royal Castle, 2.7 km from St. Mary's Basilica and 2.7 km from Lost Souls Alley. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Xerion Hotel all rooms have bed linen and towels. Continental and vegetarian breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation. St. Florian's Gate is 3.7 km from Xerion Hotel, while National Museum of Krakow is 4.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 24 km from the hotel.

name: Queen Boutique Hotel
description: The elegant, 4-star Queen Boutique Hotel is located between Kraków’s Old Town and Kazimierz district, 700 metres from the Wawel Castle. It features stylish rooms with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Sauna access is free of charge. All rooms at the Queen Boutique are air-conditioned and come with tea making set. They are decorated with modern details and contrasting bright and dark colours. Each room is soundproofed and come with a safe, minibar and a seating area. Some have stunning city views. A varied buffet breakfast is served in the air-conditioned restaurant, the Amarylis. This 3-room restaurant specialises in Polish and fusion dishes. Guests can try a selection of treatments in the on-site beauty and spa facilities. Friendly front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange shuttle service and provide tourist information. Thanks to its central location, there are many landmarks near the Queen Boutique Hotel. The Main Market Square is 1 km away. The Tempel Synagogue and the Planty Park are both within 450 metres.

name: Résidence Tournet
description: The Tournet guest house is located in Kraków’s Jewish district of Kazimierz, just 1.2 km from the historic Main Market Square. It offers colourful and affordable rooms with free Wi-Fi. All rooms at the Tournet are simply furnished and come with an electric kettle and kitchenware. Each room has a private bathroom with either bath or shower. Most rooms have a TV. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at La Bicicletta cafe. Guests of the Tournet can make use of luggage storage service or store their valuables in the reception’s safe. Shuttle services can be arranged. The Tournet is located only 400 metres from Wawel Royal Castle. City’s main railway station, Kraków Główny, is situated 2 km away and easily accessible by public transport.

name: 1891 Garni Hotel
description: Attractively situated in the centre of Kraków, 1891 Garni Hotel features air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a garden. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Private parking is available on site. The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. Featuring a private bathroom with a bath or shower and free toiletries, rooms at 1891 Garni Hotel also boast a city view. All guest rooms will provide guests with a desk and a kettle. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, vegetarian and vegan options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving international cuisine. Vegetarian, kosher and vegan options can also be requested. Popular points of interest near 1891 Garni Hotel include St. Mary's Basilica, Lost Souls Alley and Wawel Royal Castle. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 16 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Mercure Krakow Fabryczna City
description: Mercure Krakow Fabryczna City hotel is located in the historic buildings revitalized after former Polmos State Vodka Factory. This place with almost 100 years of history is part of the impressive Fabryczna City complex, because of its size it's called a city within a city.accorhotels.com

name: Q Hotel Plus Kraków
description: Situated in the Debniki district in Kraków, 1 km from Wawel Royal Castle, Q Hotel Plus Kraków features free WiFi access and private parking at a surcharge. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a TV. Rooms include a private bathroom. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Kazimierz Jewish District is 1.2 km from Q Hotel Plus Kraków, while Cracovia Stadium is 1.4 km away. Krakow - Balice Airport is 10 km from the property.

name: Hotel Pod Wawelem
