description: Located directly under the Wawel Castle hill, Hotel Pod Wawelem offers accommodation in air conditioned rooms just by one of the Kraków’s most well-known landmarks. Furnished with wooden furniture, Pod Wawelem’s heated rooms include a work desk and a satellite TV. Electric kettles are as well provided. Free Wi-Fi is offered. The 24-hour front desk can organise an airport shuttle. A breakfast buffet is available in the restaurant. Later in the day it serves Polish and European dishes. A bar is also on-site. Free welcome drinks are offered to the guests in the restaurant located on the sixth floor, that features a terrace where guests can enjoy the view of Wawel and Vistula bend. The Planty Park and Kraków’s Old Town are within 200 metres from the hotel. Kraków Główny Railway Station is 2 km away. Pod Wawelem is directly on the Vistula River waterfront.

name: Hotel Sympozjum & Spa
description: With elegant interiors and marble floors, Hotel Sympozjum & SPA offers a range of dining and relaxation facilities, just 3 kilometres from Krakow's Old Town. All rooms at the Sympozjum come with a TV, radio and bathroom with hair-dryer and a shower. Free internet is provided. Each modern bathroom has a hair-dryer and a shower. The hotel’s restaurant, Rozmaryn, serves fine European cuisine and a wide selection of wines, while the café-bar is a great place to relax with a drink. The spa facilities of Hotel Sympozjum include saunas and massage rooms. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and will gladly assist with arranging laundry or ticket services. Hotel Sympozjum & SPA allows easy access to Krakow's tourist attractions. The beautiful Main Market Square with famous Cloth Hall is only 4 km away.

name: Conrad Hotel
description: Located in Kraków, Hotel Great Polonia Conrad Kraków offers air conditioned accommodation with free Wi-Fi, tea/coffee facilities and a flat-screen TV with cable. There is a private paid outdoor and underground parking available on site, available upon prior reservation. The rooms of the Hotel Great Polonia Conrad Kraków all feature a classic interior design. Each is painted in bright colours and has furniture in warm colours, which includes a work desk. The private bathrooms have a hairdryer. The hotel has a restaurant serving European cuisine. There also is a café bar onsite. The Conrad is located on expressway E77. Both Balice Airport and Kraków’s centre are a 10 minute drive away from the hotel.

name: Shalom Kazimierz
description: Set in Kraków, 1.4 km from the centre and 1.2 km from Wawel Royal Castle, Shalom Kazimierz offers accommodation with amenities like free WiFi and flat-screen TV. There is a private bathroom with walk-in shower in all units, along with a hair dryer and free toiletries. A continental, Full English/Irish or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include St. Mary's Basilica, Lost Souls Alley and Schindler Factory Museum. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 24 km from Shalom Kazimierz, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Dwor Kosciuszko
description: Located in a quiet area within Kraków’s Kościuszko Park, Hotel Dwór Kościuszko offers beautifully designed rooms with a tea/coffee maker and free Wi-Fi. A varied buffet breakfast is served daily. The air-conditioned rooms at Dwór Kościuszko feature elegant, manor-style interiors and come with antique furniture. All offer an LCD TV and a minibar. The bathroom has a heated floor, mirror and towel rack. Free bottle of mineral water and selected newspapers are offered. The Dwór Kościuszko restaurant specialises in Polish cuisine. It offers a wide range of French, Italian and Hungarian wines. A summer terrace is also available. The Dwór hotel is situated just 4 km from the Main Market Square. With excellent tram connections, guests can quickly get to the city centre.

name: Wyspianski Hotel
description: With only a 5-minute walk of the Kraków’s beautiful Main Market Square, the Hotel Wyspiański features bright rooms with satellite TV and a modern bathroom with a hairdryer. All rooms at the Wyspiański come with a working space with a telephone. WiFi is available. Some rooms have tea and coffee making facilities. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the hotel restaurant, which specialises in Polish and European dishes. Guests can enjoy a drink or snacks at the bar. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange room service or store guests’ valuables in the hotel safety deposit box. Hotel Wyspiański is located only a 10-minute walk of the Kraków Główny Railway Station and Galeria Krakowska Shopping Centre. The central location guarantees easy access to the historical Old Town, where many dining and entertainment facilities are located.

name: Novotel Krakow City West
description: The 4-star Novotel Krakow City West will surprise you with its modern interiors, a renovated fitness centre, a swimming pool and a colorful children zone. Spacious 30-metre rooms, warm colors, super-fast WiFi guarantee a comfortable stay and ideal environment for work. At Novotel we care about your well-being, so the time spent in Novo2 Lounge bar will be the perfect ending of the day.accorhotels.com

name: Inx Design Hotel
description: Situated in Kraków, 1.5 km from Schindler Factory Museum, INX Design Hotel has a fitness centre and a shared lounge. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and an ATM. The accommodation features a business centre and free WiFi. At the hotel, every room includes a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. INX Design Hotel offers certain units that include a terrace, and all rooms are equipped with a kettle. Guest rooms feature a wardrobe. A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the property. There is an on-site restaurant, which specialises in Polish, Thai and American cuisine and also offers vegetarian and gluten-free options. Popular points of interest near INX Design Hotel include Wawel Royal Castle, St. Mary's Basilica and Lost Souls Alley. John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport is 24 km from the property.

name: Exclusive Aparthotel Kraków Browar Lubicz
description: EXCLUSIVE Aparthotel Kraków Browar Lubicz is a self-catering accommodation located in central Kraków, 100 metres from Krakow Central Railway Station and 300 metres from Galeria Krakowska. Free WiFi is available. It is 400 metres from the Old Town of Kraków. These modern apartments will provide you with a fully equipped kitchenette with a dishwasher, hotplate and oven. Private bathroom comes with a shower or bathtub, a hairdryer and free toiletries. You can enjoy city view. EXCLUSIVE Aparthotel Kraków Browar Lubicz offers breakfast which is served to apartments. It is 600 metres to St. Florian’s Gate and 1 km to the Main Market Square. Krakow - Balice Airport is located 12,8 km from the property.

name: Hotel H12
description: Situated in Kraków and with Lost Souls Alley reachable within 300 metres, Hotel H12**** features concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 200 metres from the city centre and 400 metres from St. Mary's Basilica. At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Rooms are fitted with a kettle, while some rooms also boast a patio and others also feature city views. All rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Vegetarian and gluten-free breakfast options are available each morning at Hotel H12****. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include St. Florian's Gate, Krakow Central Railway Station and Galeria Krakowska. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 17 km from Hotel H12****, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Copernicus
description: The 5-star Hotel Copernicus is housed in a Renaissance building in Kraków’s Old Town. It features beautiful, historic interiors with a sauna and swimming pool housed in the vaulted cellars. The rooms at the Copernicus are spacious and feature wooden ceilings and 14th-century decorations. All come with free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a luxurious, marble bathroom. Free mineral water and newspapers are offered. The air-conditioned Copernicus has a terrace with panoramic views of the Wawel. Guests can also visit the hotel restaurant, which serves seasonal Polish cuisine and is recommended by the Michelin Guide. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange for dry cleaning and laundry services. Guests can try a selection of massage treatments in the on-site spa facilities. Hotel Copernicus is located just a 3-minute walk from the Wawel Royal Castle. The Main Market Square is a 7-minute walk, while Kazimierz Jewish District is only a 10-minute walk away.

name: Austeria Klezmer Hois
description: Klezmer Hois guest rooms are located in the 15th century building at the very center of the Kazimierz district of Krakow. It features a peaceful garden, a restaurant, a terrace and free WiFi. Rooms at the Klezmer Hois feature antique furniture and are decorated with works of art from the past eras. Each room has a spacious bathroom with a shower and toiletries. Breakfast is served every morning. At other times, it serves traditional Galician Jewish cuisine. Original artwork hangs on the the restaurant’s walls, and there is also a well-stocked bar. Klezmer Hois is located a few minutes' walk from the center of Krakow, full of bars and nightlife. Every evening, concerts of traditional Jewish music are held in the restaurant. Kraków Airport is 16 km from Klezmer Hois.

name: Home Hotel
description: Located in the centre of Kraków, Home Aparthotel is a design property, the interiors of which are inspired by religious imagery. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and an LCD satellite TV. The rooms of the Home Aparthotel feature a unique design with various religious symbols. Each one has an electric kettle and a minibar. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. The public spaces of the property are done in black and red, with gothic decorative elements. Guests can relax in the sauna or work out in the fitness centre. Restaurant in the cellar offers a breakfast buffet in the mornings. Kraków’s Kazimierz district is within 300 metres, and the Wawel Castle is 750 metres from the property. The Old Town’s Main Market is 900 metres from Home Aparthotel.

name: Blue Swan
description: Peacefully situated near the Vistula River in the western suburb of Salwator, Blue Swan offers you comfortable rooms with free Wi-Fi and uniquely designed interiors. This intimate property has a convenient location next to a main road. Some rooms have private balconies overlooking the river. Rooms are also equipped with en suite bathrooms with under floor heating and LCD TVs. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can assist with ticket service to main city’s attractions. Guests can enjoy a drink on the terrace with a river view. The restaurant Fresco serves the variety of Italian and Polish dishes. Blue Swan is situated within a 20-minute walk from the Old Town. It offers convenient tram and bus connections with all parts of the city.

name: Meininger Kraków Centrum
description: Well set in Kraków, MEININGER Kraków Centrum provides air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a bar. The property is located 2.5 km from Schindler Factory Museum, 1.2 km from St. Florian's Gate and 1.2 km from Galeria Krakowska. Private parking is available on site. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hostel also provide guests with a city view. At MEININGER Kraków Centrum every room comes with a desk and a flat-screen TV. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Speaking both English and Polish, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay. Popular points of interest near MEININGER Kraków Centrum include St. Mary's Basilica, Lost Souls Alley and Krakow Central Railway Station. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 25 km from the hostel.

name: Hotel City Sm Business & Spa
description: Hotel City SM Business & SPA is located just 4 km from the Krakow city centre. It features an indoor pool and a wellness centre. The spa and wellness centre includes also a sauna, a steam room, a fitness room and a new Neogi Flamingo anti-ageing capsule. Guests are offered discounts in the wellness centre. Prior reservation is necessary and pool and wellness facilities are available at extra charge. This hotel offers you single, double and triple rooms with private bathrooms and free internet access. City SM Hotel also features a restaurant serving regional and international cuisine, and a café-bar with a lovely terrace in the garden. The surrounding area offers a convenient access to several main roads. Nearby attractions include the Sanctuary of Divine Mercy in the district of Lagiewniki, and just 500 metres away guests will find Zakopianka Shopping Centre.

name: Korona Guest Rooms
description: Pokoje Gościnne Korona is located only 850 metres from the lively Kazimierz district in Kraków and offers basic rooms with free Wi-Fi and private bathroom facilities. Each room at the Korona offers a TV and a private bathroom with bath or shower. Guests can benefit from a safety deposit box and a luggage storage room. The property offers a restaurant serving buffet meals, as well as a 24-hour front desk service. The Wawel Royal Castle is within a 20-minute walk. The Kraków Główny Train and Bus Station is 3 km away.

name: Hotel Rok
description: Located in a green and quite part of Kraków, the ROK Hotel offers comfortably furnished rooms with a working space and a varied buffet breakfast served every morning. Guests of the ROK can relax in the TV lounge or enjoy a selection of Polish dishes served at the hotel bar. All rooms at the ROK Hotel come with a private bathroom with a shower. Each has a TV and a radio. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can store guests’ valuables in the hotel’s safety deposit box. The ROK is located 4 km from the historic Old Town with many restaurants and cafés. Private parking is available on site.
